trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around November 30th 1947
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the front yard. The neighbors mom and two children ran over yellingthat there were UFOs hovering over the house. My mother now 100 and sister now74came out to look, and sure enough there they were. It was a hot summer dayand I lay down in the grass and watched them hover for 5-10 minutes. They wereround with domes and dull in appearance, but when they wobbled the sun hit themand they would flash brightly. I had no particular reaction, just thought itwas interesting. Suddenly they appeared to turn to the west and then in aninstant seemingly vanished.
